MICHIGAN STATE UNIVERSITY
EAST LANSING, MICHIGAN
uiKflfl-fm
Dear uid:
In re: Hillfs recent Memorandum about
altering the quarter system of mailing programs,
I feel that there certainly must be a method
of providing the school systems with taped
programs which-.will take into consideration their
closing in late May and their opening in early
September, without jeopardizing the classic
quarterly system of the calendar year. See you
in Philly.
Best regards, Dick
